trans-unit.source: Possibly this is an old Bloom Pack created before Bloom Packs could handle special characters in file names. You may be able to get the author to re-create it using a current version. If that's not possible a technical expert may be able to repair things.
trans-unit.target: Possibly this is an old Bloom Pack created before Bloom Packs could handle special characters in file names. You may be able to get the author to re-create it using a current version. If that's not possible a technical expert may be able to repair things.

trans-unit.source: The {0} Collection is now ready to use on this computer.
trans-unit.target: The {0} Collection is now ready to use on this computer.

trans-unit.note: Displayed as the message box title

trans-unit.source: This BloomPack appears to be incomplete or corrupt.
trans-unit.target: This BloomPack appears to be incomplete or corrupt.

trans-unit.source: Bloom was not able to install that Bloom Pack
trans-unit.target: Bloom was not able to install that Bloom Pack

trans-unit.note: Shown while Bloom Packs are being installed

trans-unit.source: Bloom is already running, but the contents will not show up until the next time you run Bloom
trans-unit.target: Bloom is already running, but the contents will not show up until the next time you run Bloom

trans-unit.source: The Bloom collection will not be installed.
trans-unit.target: The Bloom collection will not be installed.

trans-unit.source: This computer already has a Bloom collection named '{0}'. Do you want to replace it with the one from this Bloom Pack?
trans-unit.target: This computer already has a Bloom collection named '{0}'. Do you want to replace it with the one from this Bloom Pack?

trans-unit.source: Bloom Packs should have only a single collection folder at the top level of the .ZIP file.
trans-unit.target: Bloom Packs should have only a single collection folder at the top level of the .ZIP file.

trans-unit.source: Bloom was not able to remove the existing copy of '{0}'. Quit Bloom if it is running & try again. Otherwise, try again after restarting your computer.
trans-unit.target: Bloom was not able to remove the existing copy of '{0}'. Quit Bloom if it is running & try again. Otherwise, try again after restarting your computer.

trans-unit.source: To select, use your mouse wheel or point at what you want, or press the key shown in purple. Finally, release the key that you pressed to show this list.
trans-unit.note: When you hold down a key, a popup appears that lets you choose a related character. These instructions are shown in that popup.
OLD TEXT (before 3.9): To select, use your mouse wheel or point at what you want, then release the key.
trans-unit.target: To select, use your mouse wheel or point at what you want, or press the key shown in purple. Finally, release the key that you pressed to show this list.

trans-unit.source: This formatting is the default for all text boxes with '{0}' style.
trans-unit.target: This formatting is the default for all text boxes with '{0}' style.

trans-unit.source: This formatting is for all text boxes with '{0}' style.
trans-unit.target: This formatting is for all text boxes with '{0}' style.

trans-unit.target: This formatting is for all {0} text boxes with '{1}' style.

trans-unit.source: Sorry, Reader Templates do not allow changes to formatting.
trans-unit.target: Sorry, Reader Templates do not allow changes to formatting.

trans-unit.source: Bloom had a problem reading this book and recovered by restoring a recent backup. Please check recent changes to this book. If this happens for no obvious reason, please click Details below and report it to us.
trans-unit.target: Bloom had a problem reading this book and recovered by restoring a recent backup. Please check recent changes to this book. If this happens for no obvious reason, please click Details below and report it to us.

trans-unit.source: It appears that some part of the folder path to this book has been moved or renamed. As a result, Bloom cannot save your changes to this page, and will need to exit now. If you haven't been renaming or moving things, please click Details below and report the problem to the developers.
trans-unit.target: It appears that some part of the folder path to this book has been moved or renamed. As a result, Bloom cannot save your changes to this page, and will need to exit now. If you haven't been renaming or moving things, please click Details below and report the problem to the developers.

trans-unit.source: Open Page in Firefox (which must be in the PATH environment variable)
trans-unit.target: Open Page in Firefox (which must be in the PATH environment variable)

trans-unit.source: There was a problem while saving. Please return to the previous page and make sure it looks correct.
trans-unit.target: There was a problem while saving. Please return to the previous page and make sure it looks correct.

trans-unit.note: OLD TEXT (before 3.9): Show Experimental Commands (e.g. Export XML for InDesign)

trans-unit.source: Bloom is switching the default font for "{0}" to the new "Andika New Basic".
trans-unit.target: Bloom is switching the default font for "{0}" to the new "Andika New Basic".

trans-unit.source: This will improve the printed output for most languages. If your language is one of the few that need "Andika", you can switch it back in Settings:Book Making.
trans-unit.target: This will improve the printed output for most languages. If your language is one of the few that need "Andika", you can switch it back in Settings:Book Making.

trans-unit.note: Used in 3.9 and 4.0; not used in 4.1
Name of a Front/Back Matter Pack used for Bloom Reader
Name of a Front/Back Matter Pack that puts credits on the inside of the front cover
Name of a Front/Back Matter Pack that has SIL Papua New Guinea customizations
Name of a Front/Back Matter Pack that puts title page on the inside of the front cover and credits on the inside of the back cover
Name of the default Front/Back Matter Pack
Name of a Front/Back Matter Pack that is used for talking/animating experiences
In a local language collection, we say 'Local Language', but in a source collection, Local Language has no relevance, so we use this different label
In a local language collection, we say 'Language 2 (e.g. National Language)', but in a source collection, National Language has no relevance, so we use this different label
In a local language collection, we say 'Language 3 (e.g. Regional Language)', but in a source collection, National Language has no relevance, so we use this different label
If there is no third language specified, the link changes to this.
OLD TEXT (before 3.9, 1 fewer space): Language 3 (e.g. Regional Language) (Optional)
If you make certain changes in the settings dialog, the OK button changes to this.

trans-unit.source: Bloom will close and re-open this project with the new settings.
trans-unit.target: Bloom will close and re-open this project with the new settings.

trans-unit.source: Your system administrator manages Bloom updates for this computer.
trans-unit.target: Your system administrator manages Bloom updates for this computer.

trans-unit.source: Get more source books at BloomLibrary.org
trans-unit.note: Shown at the bottom of the list of books. User can click on it and it will attempt to open a browser to show the Bloom Library
trans-unit.target: Get more source books at BloomLibrary.org

trans-unit.source: Note: The Bloom Library contains shell books, whereas your current collection is a "source collection", meaning it is for making shell books, not for translating them into the local language.
trans-unit.note: get this clicking on BloomLibrary.org link in source collection
trans-unit.target: Note: The Bloom Library contains shell books, whereas your current collection is a "source collection", meaning it is for making shell books, not for translating them into the local language.

trans-unit.source: When you've made a shell, you can then upload it to the Bloom Library from the Publish tab.
trans-unit.note: get this clicking on BloomLibrary.org link in source collection
trans-unit.target: When you've made a shell, you can then upload it to the Bloom Library from the Publish tab.

trans-unit.note: get this clicking on BloomLibrary.org link in source collection

trans-unit.source: Bloom will now open this HTML document in your word processing program (normally Word or LibreOffice). You will be able to work with the text and images of this book. These programs normally don't do well with preserving the layout, so don't expect much.
trans-unit.target: Bloom will now open this HTML document in your word processing program (normally Word or LibreOffice). You will be able to work with the text and images of this book. These programs normally don't do well with preserving the layout, so don't expect much.

trans-unit.source: This collection is locked, so new books cannot be added/removed.
trans-unit.target: This collection is locked, so new books cannot be added/removed.

trans-unit.source: Because this is a source collection, Bloom isn't offering any existing shells as sources for new shells. If you want to add a language to a shell, instead you need to edit the collection containing the shell, rather than making a copy of it. Also, the Wall Calendar currently can't be used to make a new Shell.
trans-unit.target: Because this is a source collection, Bloom isn't offering any existing shells as sources for new shells. If you want to add a language to a shell, instead you need to edit the collection containing the shell, rather than making a copy of it. Also, the Wall Calendar currently can't be used to make a new Shell.

trans-unit.source: Make a book using this source
Create a book in my language using this source book
trans-unit.target: Create a book in my language using this source book

trans-unit.note: used in 3.9 and earlier; feature removed in 4.0
This is the button you use to create a new collection, open a new one, or get one from a repository somewhere.
This is the button you use to create a new collection, open a new one, or get one from a repository somewhere.
Restart the Bloom program, not Windows
Shown as the thumbnail caption when the book doesn't have a title.
Shown when hovering over an item in the UI Language menu. The {0} marker is filled in by a number between 1 and 100.

trans-unit.source: Could not connect to the server to check for an update. Are you connected to the internet?
trans-unit.note: Shown when Bloom tries to check for an update but can't, for example because it can't connect to the internet, or a problems with our server, etc.
trans-unit.target: Could not connect to the server to check for an update. Are you connected to the internet?

trans-unit.source: Your Bloom is up to date.
trans-unit.target: Your Bloom is up to date.

trans-unit.source: Bloom is already working on checking for updates.
trans-unit.target: Bloom is already working on checking for updates.

trans-unit.source: A new version appears to be available, but Bloom could not install it.
trans-unit.target: A new version appears to be available, but Bloom could not install it.

trans-unit.note: Appears after Bloom has downloaded a program update in the background and is ready to switch the user to it the next time they run Bloom.
OLD TEXT (before 3.9, period at end): Update for {0} is ready.

trans-unit.source: A new version of Bloom is available.
trans-unit.target: A new version of Bloom is available.

trans-unit.note: In a wizard, this button takes you to the previous step.
Used for the Finish button in wizards, like that used for making a New Collection
This is shown when Bloom is slowly loading something, so the user doesn't worry about why they don't see the result immediately.
Used for the Next button in wizards, like that used for making a New Collection
In a wizard, this button takes you to the next step.
Used to point the user to a web page. Put the '{0}' where the web page URL will go.

trans-unit.target: Your download ({0}) is complete. You can see it in the 'Books from BloomLibrary.org' section of your Collections.

trans-unit.note: OLD TEXT (before 3.9, period at end): Bloom downloaded the book but had problems making it available in Bloom. Please restart your computer and try again. If you get this message again, please click the 'Details' button and report the problem to the Bloom developers.

trans-unit.note: Used on the Title page of a book when "Paste Image Credits" is clicked and all the images in the book are by one illustrator. Put {0} in the translation where the image credits should go. For example in English, 'Images by {0}.' comes out like 'Images by John Doe, Copyright John Doe 2017, CC-BY-NC.'
Put {lang} in your translation, so it can be replaced by the language name.

trans-unit.source: Acknowledgments for this version, in {lang}. For example, give credit to the translator for this version.

trans-unit.target: International Standard Book Number. Leave blank if you don't have one of these.

trans-unit.note: The {0} is replaced by the filename of an image. The {1} is replaced by a reference to the first page in the book where that image occurs.

trans-unit.source: If you need somewhere to put more information about the book, you can use this page, which is the inside of the front cover.
trans-unit.target: If you need somewhere to put more information about the book, you can use this page, which is the inside of the front cover.

trans-unit.note: This is used to separate items in a list, such as 'Province, District, Country' on the Title Page. For English, that means comma followed by a space. Don't forget the space if your script uses them.

trans-unit.source: Something to tell the reader/viewer that this is the end of the book.
trans-unit.target: Something to tell the reader/viewer that this is the end of the book.

trans-unit.source: Something to tell the reader/viewer that this is the end.
trans-unit.target: Something to tell the reader/viewer that this is the end.

trans-unit.note: Used on the Title page of a book when "Paste Image Credits" is clicked. Put {0} in the translation where the list of page numbers should go and put {1} in the translation where the image credits should go. For example in English, 'Images on pages {0} by {1}.' comes out like 'Images on pages 1, 2, and 4 by John Doe, Copyright John Doe 2017, CC-BY-NC.'
OLD TEXT (early 4.1, remove quotation marks): "Images on pages {0} by {1}."

trans-unit.source: The contributions made by writers, illustrators, editors, etc., in {lang}
trans-unit.target: The contributions made by writers, illustrators, editors, etc., in {lang}

trans-unit.note: On the Credits page of a book being translated, Bloom shows the original copyright. Put {0} in the translation where the copyright notice should go. For example in English, 'Adapted from original, {0}.' comes out like 'Adapted from original, Copyright 2011 SIL'.

trans-unit.source: Adapted from original without a copyright notice.
trans-unit.note: On the Credits page of a book being translated, Bloom shows this if the original book did not have a copyright notice.
trans-unit.target: Adapted from original without a copyright notice.

trans-unit.note: On the Credits page of a book being translated, Bloom puts texts like 'Licensed under CC-BY', so that we have a record of what the license was for the original book. Put {0} in the translation, where the license should go in the sentence.

trans-unit.source: Simple line drawings look best. Instead of using this page, you can also make your own thumbnail.png file and set it to Read-only so Bloom doesn't write over it.
trans-unit.target: Simple line drawings look best. Instead of using this page, you can also make your own thumbnail.png file and set it to Read-only so Bloom doesn't write over it.

trans-unit.note: Used on the Title page of a book when "Paste Image Credits" is clicked. Put {0} in the translation where the page number of an image should go and put {1} in the translation where the image credits should go. For example in English, 'Image on page {0} by {1}.' comes out like 'Image on page 3 by John Doe, Copyright John Doe 2017, CC-BY-NC.'
OLD TEXT (early 4.1, remove quotation marks): "Image on page {0} by {1}."

trans-unit.target: To unlock this shellbook, click the lock icon in the lower left corner.

trans-unit.source: Image is missing information on Credits, Copyright, or License
trans-unit.target: Image is missing information on Credits, Copyright, or License

trans-unit.source: Try closing other programs and restart your computer if necessary.
trans-unit.target: Try closing other programs and restart your computer if necessary.

trans-unit.source: Feel free to modify or delete this page.
trans-unit.target: Feel free to modify or delete this page.

trans-unit.source:
The file you’ve chosen is a “JPEG” file. JPEG files are perfect for photographs and color artwork. However, JPEG files are a big problem for black and white line art. Problems include:
• Fuzziness and grey dots.
• Large file sizes, making the book hard to share.
• If there are many large JPEGs, Bloom may not have enough memory to make PDF files.

Note: Because JPEG is “lossy”, converting a JPEG to PNG, TIFF, or BMP actually makes things even worse. If this is black and white line art, you want to get an original scan in one of those formats.

Please select from one of the following, then click “OK”:
trans-unit.target:
The file you’ve chosen is a “JPEG” file. JPEG files are perfect for photographs and color artwork. However, JPEG files are a big problem for black and white line art. Problems include:
• Fuzziness and grey dots.
• Large file sizes, making the book hard to share.
• If there are many large JPEGs, Bloom may not have enough memory to make PDF files.

Note: Because JPEG is “lossy”, converting a JPEG to PNG, TIFF, or BMP actually makes things even worse. If this is black and white line art, you want to get an original scan in one of those formats.

Please select from one of the following, then click “OK”:

trans-unit.source: This option is only available in the Publish tab.
trans-unit.target: This option is only available in the Publish tab.

trans-unit.note: Default file and folder name when you make a new book, but haven't give it a title yet.

trans-unit.target: A container on this page is overflowing

trans-unit.source: "Normal" will show local language, and potentially regional or national, depending on the multilingual settings of the book. Use this for most content.
trans-unit.target: "Normal" will show local language, and potentially regional or national, depending on the multilingual settings of the book. Use this for most content.

trans-unit.target: On each language-field in the group

trans-unit.source: What should authors put in this box?
trans-unit.target: What should authors put in this box?

trans-unit.source: Motion Books are Bloom Reader books with two modes. Normally, they are Talking Books. When you turn the phone sideways, the picture fills the screen. It pans and zooms from rectangle "1" to rectangle "2".
trans-unit.target: Motion Books are Bloom Reader books with two modes. Normally, they are Talking Books. When you turn the phone sideways, the picture fills the screen. It pans and zooms from rectangle "1" to rectangle "2".

trans-unit.note: The label of a checkbox indicating whether motion is included in Preview (currently it always is, so the box is always checked)
The label of a checkbox indicating whether background music is played during Preview.
The label of a checkbox controlling whether voice narration plays during Preview.
Used as the overall title of the toolbox panel

trans-unit.source: The selected sound file "{0}" cannot be played by Bloom. Please choose another sound file.
trans-unit.note: The {0} is replaced by the filename.
trans-unit.target: The selected sound file "{0}" cannot be played by Bloom. Please choose another sound file.

trans-unit.source: You can set up background music to play with this page when the book is viewed in the Bloom Reader app.
trans-unit.target: You can set up background music to play with this page when the book is viewed in the Bloom Reader app.

Used to create string "Level # of #". The spaces on each side of this word are added programmatically.
Appears in place of other controls when they may not be used because no Bloom Enterprise project has been selected.

trans-unit.source: Bloom normally prevents most changes to shellbooks. If you need to add pages, change images, etc., tick the box below.
trans-unit.target: Bloom normally prevents most changes to shellbooks. If you need to add pages, change images, etc., tick the box below.

trans-unit.source: Here is what your camera sees:
trans-unit.target: Here is what your camera sees:

trans-unit.source: Bloom recording is in an unusual state, possibly caused by unplugging a microphone. You will need to restart.
trans-unit.note: This is very low priority for translation.
trans-unit.target: Bloom recording is in an unusual state, possibly caused by unplugging a microphone. You will need to restart.

trans-unit.source: This computer appears to have no sound recording device available. You will need one to record audio for a talking book.
trans-unit.target: This computer appears to have no sound recording device available. You will need one to record audio for a talking book.

trans-unit.source: Please hold the button down until you have finished recording
trans-unit.note: Appears when the speak/record button is pressed very briefly
trans-unit.target: Please hold the button down until you have finished recording

trans-unit.source: 1) Check that you are recording into the correct device and that these levels are showing blue:
trans-unit.target: 1) Check that you are recording into the correct device and that these levels are showing blue:

trans-unit.source: Make an e-book that can play recordings while highlighting sentences.
trans-unit.target: Make an e-book that can play recordings while highlighting sentences.

trans-unit.note: Shown in edit tab multilingualism chooser, for trilingual mode, 3 languages per page

trans-unit.source: This book is in translate-only mode. If you want to make other changes, click this to temporarily unlock the book.
trans-unit.note: Button that tells Bloom to temporarily unlock a shell book for editing other than translation.
trans-unit.target: This book is in translate-only mode. If you want to make other changes, click this to temporarily unlock the book.

trans-unit.source: Bloom had a problem showing this book. This doesn't mean your work is lost, but it does mean that something is out of date, is missing, or has gone wrong.
trans-unit.target: Bloom had a problem showing this book. This doesn't mean your work is lost, but it does mean that something is out of date, is missing, or has gone wrong.

trans-unit.note: displays as a "toast", {0} is the URL/filename

trans-unit.source: Bloom was unable to start its own HTTP listener that it uses to talk to its embedded Firefox browser. If this happens even if you just restarted your computer, then ask someone to investigate if you have an aggressive firewall product installed, which may need to be uninstalled before you can use Bloom.
trans-unit.note: OLD TEXT (before 3.9, shorter wording): Bloom was unable to start its own HTTP listener that it uses to talk to its embedded Firefox browser. If this happens even if you just restarted your computer, ask someone to investigate if you have an aggressive firewall product installed. The agressive firewall product may need to be uninstalled before you can use Bloom.
trans-unit.target: Bloom was unable to start its own HTTP listener that it uses to talk to its embedded Firefox browser. If this happens even if you just restarted your computer, then ask someone to investigate if you have an aggressive firewall product installed, which may need to be uninstalled before you can use Bloom.

trans-unit.source: Bloom had trouble saving a page. Please click Details below and report this to us. Then quit Bloom, run it again, and check to see if the page you just edited is missing anything. Sorry!
trans-unit.target: Bloom had trouble saving a page. Please click Details below and report this to us. Then quit Bloom, run it again, and check to see if the page you just edited is missing anything. Sorry!

trans-unit.source: This might be caused by Windows Defender "Controlled Folder Access" or some other virus protection.
trans-unit.note: After an October 2017 windows update, this appears when Bloom opens a collection and tries to write out the collection settings.
trans-unit.target: This might be caused by Windows Defender "Controlled Folder Access" or some other virus protection.

trans-unit.source: This program cannot write to the folder {0}.
trans-unit.note: This only happens on Windows after an October 2017 update, {0} is the folder that Bloom failed to write to.
trans-unit.target: This program cannot write to the folder {0}.

trans-unit.source: Your computer denied Bloom access to the book. You may need technical help in setting the operating system permissions for this file.
trans-unit.target: Your computer denied Bloom access to the book. You may need technical help in setting the operating system permissions for this file.

trans-unit.source: There was a problem selecting the book. Restarting Bloom may fix the problem. If not, please click the 'Details' button and report the problem to the Bloom Developers.
trans-unit.note: OLD TEXT (before 3.9, added spaces): There was a problem selecting the book. Restarting Bloom may fix the problem. If not, please click the 'Details' button and report the problem to the Bloom Developers.
trans-unit.target: There was a problem selecting the book. Restarting Bloom may fix the problem. If not, please click the 'Details' button and report the problem to the Bloom Developers.

trans-unit.source: There was a problem updating the book. Restarting Bloom may fix the problem. If not, please click the 'Details' button and report the problem to the Bloom Developers.

trans-unit.target: Bloom had a problem deleting this file: {0}

trans-unit.target: Bloom had a problem importing this picture.

trans-unit.source: Bloom had a problem importing this video.

trans-unit.source: Report this problem to Bloom Support
trans-unit.target: Report this problem to Bloom Support

trans-unit.source: This Book called for Front/Back Matter pack named '{0}', but Bloom couldn't find that on this computer. You can either install a Bloom Pack that will give you '{0}', or change the book's Front/Back Matter pack setting.
trans-unit.note: Not found in version 3.9 or later)
trans-unit.target: This Book called for Front/Back Matter pack named '{0}', but Bloom couldn't find that on this computer. You can either install a Bloom Pack that will give you '{0}', or change the book's Front/Back Matter pack setting.

trans-unit.source: This Collection called for Front/Back Matter pack named '{0}', but this version of Bloom does not have it, and Bloom could not find it on this computer. The collection has been changed to use the default Front/Back Matter pages.
trans-unit.note: OLD TEXT (before 3.9, reworded): This Book called for Front/Back Matter pack named '{0}', but Bloom couldn't find that on this computer. You can either install a Bloom Pack that will give you '{0}', or go to Settings:Book Making and change to another Front/Back Matter Pack.
trans-unit.target: This Collection called for Front/Back Matter pack named '{0}', but this version of Bloom does not have it, and Bloom could not find it on this computer. The collection has been changed to use the default Front/Back Matter pages.

trans-unit.note: This shows in the 'toast' that pops up to notify the user of a non-fatal problem.

trans-unit.source: This book called for a Front/Back Matter pack named '{0}', but this version of Bloom does not have it, and Bloom could not find it on this computer. The book has been changed to use the Front/Back Matter pages from the Collection Settings.
trans-unit.target: This book called for a Front/Back Matter pack named '{0}', but this version of Bloom does not have it, and Bloom could not find it on this computer. The book has been changed to use the Front/Back Matter pages from the Collection Settings.

trans-unit.source: Bloom cannot start properly, and this symptom has been observed on machines with ZoneAlarm installed. Note: disabling ZoneAlarm does not help. Nor does restarting with it turned off. Something about the installation of ZoneAlarm causes the problem, and so far only uninstalling ZoneAlarm has been shown to fix the problem.
trans-unit.target: Bloom cannot start properly, and this symptom has been observed on machines with ZoneAlarm installed. Note: disabling ZoneAlarm does not help. Nor does restarting with it turned off. Something about the installation of ZoneAlarm causes the problem, and so far only uninstalling ZoneAlarm has been shown to fix the problem.

trans-unit.note: OLD TEXT (before 3.9, added dots): About Bloom
OLD TEXT (before 3.9, shortened): Request a Feature (web)

trans-unit.source: A component of Bloom, BloomPdfMaker.exe, seems to be missing. This prevents previews and printing. Antivirus software sometimes does this. You may need technical help to repair the Bloom installation and protect this file from being deleted again.
trans-unit.target: A component of Bloom, BloomPdfMaker.exe, seems to be missing. This prevents previews and printing. Antivirus software sometimes does this. You may need technical help to repair the Bloom installation and protect this file from being deleted again.

trans-unit.target: What would you like to call this collection?

trans-unit.note: {0} is the name of the new collection
trans-unit.target: OK, that's all we need to get started with your new '{0}' collection.\nClick on the 'Finish' button.

trans-unit.source: If you already have a collection you want to open, click the 'Cancel' button.
trans-unit.target: If you already have a collection you want to open, click the 'Cancel' button.

trans-unit.source: A collection of shell or template books in one or more languages of wider communication. You will be able to upload these shells to BloomLibrary.org. You may also make a Bloom Pack to give to others so that they can make local language books with your shells.
trans-unit.target: A collection of shell or template books in one or more languages of wider communication. You will be able to upload these shells to BloomLibrary.org. You may also make a Bloom Pack to give to others so that they can make local language books with your shells.

trans-unit.source: A collection of books in a local language.
trans-unit.target: A collection of books in a local language.

trans-unit.source: These are optional. Bloom will place them in the right places on title page of books you create.
trans-unit.target: These are optional. Bloom will place them in the right places on title page of books you create.

trans-unit.note: The {0} is replaced by the name of the language.

trans-unit.source: Unable to create a new collection using that name.
trans-unit.target: Unable to create a new collection using that name.

trans-unit.source: You are almost ready to start making books.
trans-unit.target: You are almost ready to start making books.

trans-unit.source: In order to keep things simple and organized, Bloom keeps all the books you make in one or more Collections. The first thing we need to do is make one for you.
trans-unit.target: In order to keep things simple and organized, Bloom keeps all the books you make in one or more Collections. The first thing we need to do is make one for you.

trans-unit.source: Bloom detected that this collection is located in your Dropbox folder. This can cause problems as Dropbox sometimes locks Bloom out of its own files. If you have problems, we recommend that you move your collection somewhere else or disable Dropbox while using Bloom.
trans-unit.target: Bloom detected that this collection is located in your Dropbox folder. This can cause problems as Dropbox sometimes locks Bloom out of its own files. If you have problems, we recommend that you move your collection somewhere else or disable Dropbox while using Bloom.

trans-unit.source: This collection is part of your 'Sources for new books' which you can see in the bottom left of the Collections tab. It cannot be opened for editing.
trans-unit.target: This collection is part of your 'Sources for new books' which you can see in the bottom left of the Collections tab. It cannot be opened for editing.

trans-unit.note: This shows in the file-open dialog that you use to open a different bloom collection

trans-unit.source: Browse for another collection on this computer
trans-unit.target: Browse for another collection on this computer

trans-unit.source: Copy From Chorus Hub on Local Network
trans-unit.target: Copy From Chorus Hub on Local Network

trans-unit.note: This opens the Chorus Help to learn more about send/receive.

trans-unit.source: Has someone else used Send/Receive to share a collection with you?\nUse one of these red buttons to copy their collection to your computer.\nLater, use Send/Receive to share your work back with them.
trans-unit.target: Has someone else used Send/Receive to share a collection with you?\nUse one of these red buttons to copy their collection to your computer.\nLater, use Send/Receive to share your work back with them.

trans-unit.source: Pages can not be re-ordered when you are translating a book.
trans-unit.target: Pages can not be re-ordered when you are translating a book.

trans-unit.source: Please install Adobe Reader so that Bloom can show your completed book. Until then, you can still save the PDF Book and open it in some other program.
trans-unit.target: Please install Adobe Reader so that Bloom can show your completed book. Until then, you can still save the PDF Book and open it in some other program.

trans-unit.source: That's strange... Adobe Reader gave an error when trying to show that PDF. You can still try saving the PDF Book.
trans-unit.target: That's strange... Adobe Reader gave an error when trying to show that PDF. You can still try saving the PDF Book.

trans-unit.source: Sad News. Bloom wasn't able to get Adobe Reader to show here, so Bloom can't show your completed book.\nPlease uninstall your existing version of 'Adobe Reader' and (re)install 'Adobe Reader'.\nUntil you get that fixed, you can still save the PDF Book and open it in some other program.
trans-unit.target: Sad News. Bloom wasn't able to get Adobe Reader to show here, so Bloom can't show your completed book.\nPlease uninstall your existing version of 'Adobe Reader' and (re)install 'Adobe Reader'.\nUntil you get that fixed, you can still save the PDF Book and open it in some other program.

trans-unit.note: Help link under Motion Book checkbox

trans-unit.source: Looking for an Android device connected by USB cable and set up for MTP...

trans-unit.target: Looking for an Android device connected by USB cable and set up for MTP...

trans-unit.source: The following connected devices all have Bloom Reader installed. Please connect only one of these devices.
trans-unit.target: The following connected devices all have Bloom Reader installed. Please connect only one of these devices.

trans-unit.target: Sending the book failed. Possibly the device was disconnected? If you can't see a reason for this the following may be helpful to report to the developers:

trans-unit.target: On the Android, run Bloom Reader, open the menu and choose 'Receive Books from computer'.

trans-unit.note: Here, the English 'Accessibility' is a common way of refering to technologies that are usable by people with disabilities. With computers, this usually means people with visual impairments. It includes botht he blind and people who might need text to be larger, or who are colorblind, etc.

trans-unit.source: Bloom uses Adobe color profiles to convert PDF files from using RGB color to using CMYK color. This is part of preparing a "PDF for Printshop". You must agree to the following license in order to perform this task in Bloom.

trans-unit.target: One or more fields above need your attention before uploading.

trans-unit.source: Sorry, "{0}" was not successfully uploaded. Sometimes this is caused by temporary problems with the servers we use. It's worth trying again in an hour or two. If you regularly get this problem please report it to us.
trans-unit.target: Sorry, "{0}" was not successfully uploaded. Sometimes this is caused by temporary problems with the servers we use. It's worth trying again in an hour or two. If you regularly get this problem please report it to us.

trans-unit.source: By uploading, you confirm your agreement with the Bloom Library Terms of Use and grant the rights it describes.
trans-unit.target: By uploading, you confirm your agreement with the Bloom Library Terms of Use and grant the rights it describes.

trans-unit.source: There was a problem uploading your book.
trans-unit.target: There was a problem uploading your book.

trans-unit.source: In the Bloom community, we help each other by sharing both new and newly translated books on the Bloom Library.
trans-unit.target: In the Bloom community, we help each other by sharing both new and newly translated books on the Bloom Library.

trans-unit.note: This is added after the language name, in order to indicate that some parts of the book have not been translated into this language yet.

trans-unit.source: We cannot sign you up with that address, because we already have an account with that address. Would you like to log in instead?
trans-unit.note: OLD TEXT (before 3.9, added space): We cannot sign you up with that address, because we already have an account with that address. Would you like to log in instead?
trans-unit.target: We cannot sign you up with that address, because we already have an account with that address. Would you like to log in instead?

trans-unit.source: Bloom could not connect to the server to verify your login. Please check your network connection.
trans-unit.target: Bloom could not connect to the server to verify your login. Please check your network connection.

trans-unit.source: Bloom could not connect to the server to complete your login or signup. This could be a problem with your internet connection, our server, or some equipment in between.
trans-unit.target: Bloom could not connect to the server to complete your login or signup. This could be a problem with your internet connection, our server, or some equipment in between.

trans-unit.source: In order to sign up for a BloomLibrary.org account, you must check the box indicating that you agree to the BloomLibrary Terms of Use.
trans-unit.target: In order to sign up for a BloomLibrary.org account, you must check the box indicating that you agree to the BloomLibrary Terms of Use.

trans-unit.source: We don't have a user on record with that email. Would you like to sign up?
trans-unit.target: We don't have a user on record with that email. Would you like to sign up?

trans-unit.source: Password and user ID did not match
trans-unit.target: Password and user ID did not match

trans-unit.source: Please agree to terms of use
Please enter a valid email address. We will send an email to this address so you can reset your password.
trans-unit.target: Please enter a valid email address. We will send an email to this address so you can reset your password.

trans-unit.source: Bloom could not connect to the server to reset your password. Please check your network connection.
trans-unit.target: Bloom could not connect to the server to reset your password. Please check your network connection.

trans-unit.source: We are sending an email to {0} with instructions for how to reset your password.
trans-unit.target: We are sending an email to {0} with instructions for how to reset your password.

trans-unit.source: Bloom could not log in to BloomLibrary.org using your saved credentials. Please check your network connection.
trans-unit.target: Bloom could not log in to BloomLibrary.org using your saved credentials. Please check your network connection.

trans-unit.source: Sorry, this version of Bloom Desktop is not compatible with the current version of BloomLibrary.org. Please upgrade to a newer version.
trans-unit.target: Sorry, this version of Bloom Desktop is not compatible with the current version of BloomLibrary.org. Please upgrade to a newer version.

trans-unit.source: Please log in to BloomLibrary.org (or sign up) before uploading
trans-unit.target: Please log in to BloomLibrary.org (or sign up) before uploading

trans-unit.source: Please set this from the edit tab
trans-unit.note: This shows next to the license, if the license has not yet been set.
trans-unit.target: Please set this from the edit tab

trans-unit.source: Suggestion: Assigning a Creative Commons License makes it easy for you to clearly grant certain permissions to everyone.
trans-unit.target: Suggestion: Assigning a Creative Commons License makes it easy for you to clearly grant certain permissions to everyone.

trans-unit.source: Suggestion: Creative Commons Licenses make it much easier for others to use your book, even if they aren't fluent in the language of your custom license.
trans-unit.target: Suggestion: Creative Commons Licenses make it much easier for others to use your book, even if they aren't fluent in the language of your custom license.

trans-unit.source: This book seems to be a template, that is, it contains blank pages for authoring a new book rather than content to translate into other languages. If that is not what you intended, you should get expert help before uploading this book.\n\nDo you want to go ahead?
trans-unit.note:
OLD TEXT (before 4.0, mark newlines properly): This book seems to be a template, that is, it contains blank pages for authoring a new book rather than content to translate into other languages. If that is not what you intended, you should get expert help before uploading this book.
Do you want to go ahead?
trans-unit.target: This book seems to be a template, that is, it contains blank pages for authoring a new book rather than content to translate into other languages. If that is not what you intended, you should get expert help before uploading this book.\n\nDo you want to go ahead?

trans-unit.source: There was a problem uploading your book. This is probably because your computer is set to use the wrong timezone or your system time is badly wrong. See http://www.di-mgt.com.au/wclock/help/wclo_setsysclock.html for how to fix this.
trans-unit.target: There was a problem uploading your book. This is probably because your computer is set to use the wrong timezone or your system time is badly wrong. See http://www.di-mgt.com.au/wclock/help/wclo_setsysclock.html for how to fix this.

trans-unit.source: Congratulations, "{0}" is now available on BloomLibrary.org ({1})
trans-unit.target: Congratulations, "{0}" is now available on BloomLibrary.org ({1})

trans-unit.source: There was a problem uploading your book. You may need to restart Bloom or get technical help.
trans-unit.target: There was a problem uploading your book. You may need to restart Bloom or get technical help.

trans-unit.note: In this step, Bloom is uploading things like title, languages, and topic tags to the BloomLibrary.org database.
OLD TEXT (before 3.9): Maximum Words per Book

trans-unit.source: Click on letters to add them to this stage.
trans-unit.target: Click on letters to add them to this stage.

trans-unit.source: Help exporting and converting files to use as sample texts
trans-unit.target: Help exporting and converting files to use as sample texts

trans-unit.source: To help you make decodable readers, Bloom needs to know the letters and letter combinations that you will be teaching.
trans-unit.target: To help you make decodable readers, Bloom needs to know the letters and letter combinations that you will be teaching.

trans-unit.source: Separate each letter or letter combination with a space. For example, here is what we might use for the English language:
trans-unit.target: Separate each letter or letter combination with a space. For example, here is what we might use for the English language:

trans-unit.source: Notice that the English list includes symbols that are used to make words, like ' in
trans-unit.target: Notice that the English list includes symbols that are used to make words, like ' in

trans-unit.note: OLD TEXT (before 3.9, use literal NBSP character): Level

trans-unit.source: Maximum Average Length of Sentences in Book
trans-unit.target: Maximum Average Length of Sentences in Book

trans-unit.note: OLD TEXT (before 3.9, reworded): Maximum Unique Words per Book

trans-unit.source: Bloom already knows which characters in the world's languages always mark the end of sentences. To add others, enter the Unicode character escapes here. For example for Thai script languages, enter \U0020 to tell Bloom that normal spaces are used to break sentences.
trans-unit.target: Bloom already knows which characters in the world's languages always mark the end of sentences. To add others, enter the Unicode character escapes here. For example for Thai script languages, enter \U0020 to tell Bloom that normal spaces are used to break sentences.

trans-unit.source: set up the alphabet for this language.
Things to remember for this level:
To help you make decodable readers, Bloom can suggest words that fit within the current stage. There are two ways to give words to Bloom:
trans-unit.note: OLD TEXT (before 3.9, added space): To help you make decodable readers, Bloom can suggest words that fit within the current stage. There are two ways to give words to Bloom:
trans-unit.target: To help you make decodable readers, Bloom can suggest words that fit within the current stage. There are two ways to give words to Bloom:

trans-unit.source: We are using lists of allowed words to define stages
trans-unit.target: We are using lists of allowed words to define stages

trans-unit.source: We are using letters with sight words to define stages
trans-unit.target: We are using letters with sight words to define stages

trans-unit.source: In addition, this Bloom Pack will carry your latest decodable and leveled reader settings for the "{0}" language. Anyone opening this Bloom Pack, who then opens a "{0}" collection, will have their current decodable and leveled reader settings replaced by the settings in this Bloom Pack. They will also get the current set of words for use in decodable readers.
trans-unit.note: OLD TEXT (before 3.9, remove unwanted backslashes): In addition, this Bloom Pack will carry your latest decodable and leveled reader settings for the \"{0}\" language. Anyone opening this Bloom Pack, who then opens a \"{0}\" collection, will have their current decodable and leveled reader settings replaced by the settings in this Bloom Pack. They will also get the current set of words for use in decodable readers.
trans-unit.target: In addition, this Bloom Pack will carry your latest decodable and leveled reader settings for the "{0}" language. Anyone opening this Bloom Pack, who then opens a "{0}" collection, will have their current decodable and leveled reader settings replaced by the settings in this Bloom Pack. They will also get the current set of words for use in decodable readers.

trans-unit.note: Place a {0} where the name of the program goes.
Shown in the button that closes the dialog after a successful report submission.

trans-unit.source: Bloom was not able to submit your report directly to our server. Please retry or email {0} to {1}.
trans-unit.target: Bloom was not able to submit your report directly to our server. Please retry or email {0} to {1}.

trans-unit.note: Shown if there was an error submitting the report. Lets the user try submitting it again.

trans-unit.source: See what else will be submitted
trans-unit.target: See what else will be submitted

trans-unit.note: This is shown while Bloom is sending the problem report to our server.

trans-unit.source: We received your report, thanks for taking the time to help make Bloom better!
trans-unit.target: We received your report, thanks for taking the time to help make Bloom better!

trans-unit.source: What seems to be the problem?
trans-unit.target: What seems to be the problem?

trans-unit.note: This is shown while Bloom is creating the problem report. It's generally too fast to see, unless you include a large book.

trans-unit.source: I get it. Do not show this again.
trans-unit.target: I get it. Do not show this again.

trans-unit.source: Please notice the sample printer settings below. Use them as a guide while you set up the printer.
trans-unit.target: Please notice the sample printer settings below. Use them as a guide while you set up the printer.

trans-unit.source: This script is right to left
trans-unit.target: This script is right to left
